At The Focal Therapy Clinic we are passionate about prostate cancer sufferers knowing about all of their treatment options.We know that settling on the right treatment is a big decision for you. If you would like to speak to one of our friendly and knowledgeable patient advocates about your diagnosis and our Focal Therapy treatment options then please do not hesitate to get in touch today.All enquiries to The Focal Therapy Clinic are confidential, and we are delighted to offer our advice and support with no obligation.Number:020 7036 8870Email:info@thefocaltherapyclinic.co.uk
